channel.title: Changing the camera views of your character?
channel.description:
Is it possible to change the camera views of you character?
If so how would i change them?
At the moment you can only make the camera view your character at a max hieght of 50 degrees, And a minimum hieght of 20 degrees (this is shown by the red lines on the picture below).
[img]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/4336/viewgg5.png[/img]
I want to be able to change the camera views to a max of 90 degrees and a minum of 0 degrees (this is hown by the black lines on the picture above).
This would mean i could see my character from the top and eye height.
